name: Violet Beauregarde Part 2
description: A floral and sweet variation of the classic Champagne cocktail from Josh Berner of Ripple in Washington, DC.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Tempus Fugit Liqueur De Violettes
1 ounce fresh squeezed lemon juice from 1 lemon
Garnish: extra long lemon twist for each glass

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add Liqueur de Violette, Aperol, and lemon juice. Stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into two flutes and top each glass with sparkling wine. Garnish with extra long lemon peel.
